p: The seasonal variation had marked impact on the amount of total flavone and flavanol contents (TFFC) ( p < 0.01). The lowest concentration of TFFC was recorded in January (2.10 mg QUE/g DW). The amount of the TFFC was continuously increased from February, and the maximum concentration appeared in July (2.32 mg QUE/g DW). Thereafter, an opposite trend was observed and markedly declined from August to December (2.29â€“2.16 mg QUE/g DW) ( Figure 3).
